Colors

HSL-based colors derived from hue tokens.

Primary
Status
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-primary); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-primary-light); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-primary-dark); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><span>Primary</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-success); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-warning); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-row-2); background: var(--ui-color-danger); border-radius: var(--ui-radius-sm)"></div><span>Status</span></div>

Grid System

All spacing and heights align to the 8px grid.

row-1 (16px)
row-2 (32px)
row-3 (48px)
<div style="background: var(--ui-color-primary); color: var(--ui-color-text-inverse); height: var(--ui-row-1); display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 0 var(--ui-space-2)">row-1 (16px)</div>
<div style="background: var(--ui-color-primary); color: var(--ui-color-text-inverse); height: var(--ui-row-2); display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 0 var(--ui-space-2)">row-2 (32px)</div>
<div style="background: var(--ui-color-primary); color: var(--ui-color-text-inverse); height: var(--ui-row-3); display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 0 var(--ui-space-2)">row-3 (48px)</div>

Spacing

Spacing tokens based on the 8px unit.

space-1
space-2
space-3
space-4
space-6
space-8
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-1); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-1</small></div>
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-2); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-2</small></div>
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-3); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-3</small></div>
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-4); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-4</small></div>
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-6); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-6</small></div>
<div class="ui-stack ui-stack--xs" style="align-items: center"><div style="width: var(--ui-space-8); height: var(--ui-space-4); background: var(--ui-color-primary)"></div><small>space-8</small></div>

Typography

All line-heights snap to the 8px grid. Toggle the baseline grid to verify.

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>

Body text at 16px with 24px line-height. The bold text and inline code maintain the same rhythm.

Small text at 14px with 16px line-height.

<p>Body text at 16px with 24px line-height. The <strong>bold text</strong> and <code>inline code</code> maintain the same rhythm.</p>
<p><small>Small text at 14px with 16px line-height.</small></p>

Layout

Layout primitives for app shells with sidebars and content containers.

App Shell + Sidebar + Main

This page uses the layout primitives:

<body class="ui-app-shell">
  <aside class="ui-sidebar">
    <!-- sidebar content -->
  </aside>
  <main class="ui-main">
    <div class="ui-container">
      <!-- page content -->
    </div>
  </main>
</body>

Sidebar Widths

.ui-sidebar--sm192px (24 units)
.ui-sidebar--md240px (30 units) - default
.ui-sidebar--lg320px (40 units)
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-sidebar--sm</code><span>192px (24 units)</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-sidebar--md</code><span>240px (30 units) - default</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-sidebar--lg</code><span>320px (40 units)</span></div>

Sidebar Position

By default, sidebar is on the start (left in LTR). Use .ui-sidebar--end for right-side:

<aside class="ui-sidebar ui-sidebar--end">...</aside>
<main class="ui-main ui-main--sidebar-end">...</main>

Container Widths

.ui-container--sm640px (80 units)
.ui-container--md800px (100 units)
.ui-container--lg960px (120 units) - default
.ui-container--xl1280px (160 units)
.ui-container--fullNo max width
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-container--sm</code><span>640px (80 units)</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-container--md</code><span>800px (100 units)</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-container--lg</code><span>960px (120 units) - default</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-container--xl</code><span>1280px (160 units)</span></div>
<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--sm"><code>.ui-container--full</code><span>No max width</span></div>

Centered Container

<div class="ui-container ui-container--center">
  <!-- centered content with max-width -->
</div>

Alert

Informational banner for important messages. Use variants for different message types.

Default

Note

This is a default alert message.

<div class="ui-alert">
  <div class="ui-alert__content">
    <p class="ui-alert__title">Note</p>
    <p class="ui-alert__description">This is a default alert.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Variants

Info

Informational message for the user.

Success

Your action was completed successfully.

Warning

Please review before continuing.

Error

Something went wrong. Please try again.

<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--info">...</div>
<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--success">...</div>
<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--warning">...</div>
<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--danger">...</div>

With Icon

Your session will expire in 5 minutes.

<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--info">
  <svg class="ui-icon ui-alert__icon">...</svg>
  <div class="ui-alert__content">
    <p class="ui-alert__description">Your session will expire.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Description Only

File uploaded successfully.

<div class="ui-alert ui-alert--success">
  <div class="ui-alert__content">
    <p class="ui-alert__description">File uploaded.</p>
  </div>
</div>

Button

Button heights align to grid rows.

Default

<button class="ui-button">Primary Button</button>
VariableDefaultValue
--button-height --row-2 $row * 2
--button-padding-x --space-2 $unit * 2
--button-font-size --size-sm 0.875rem
--button-font-weight --weight-medium 500
--button-radius --radius-md $unit
--button-bg --color-primary hsl($hue-primary 85% 50%)
--button-bg-hover --color-primary-dark hsl($hue-primary 85% 40%)
--button-text --color-text-inverse $color-neutral-50

Sizes

<button class="ui-button ui-button--sm">Small (24px)</button>
<button class="ui-button">Default (32px)</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--lg">Large (40px)</button>
sm
VariableDefaultValue
--button-height-sm calc(--row * 1.5) calc(--row * 1.5)
--button-font-size-sm --size-xs 0.75rem
lg
VariableDefaultValue
--button-height-lg calc(--row * 2.5) calc(--row * 2.5)
--button-padding-x-lg --space-3 $unit * 3
--button-font-size-lg --size-md 1rem

Variants

<button class="ui-button">Primary</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--secondary">Secondary</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--outline">Outline</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--ghost">Ghost</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--danger">Danger</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--link">Link</button>
secondary
VariableDefaultValue
--button-secondary-bg --color-bg-muted $color-neutral-200
--button-secondary-bg-hover --color-border-strong $color-neutral-300
--button-secondary-text --color-text $color-neutral-900
outline
VariableDefaultValue
--button-outline-bg transparent transparent
--button-outline-bg-hover --color-primary hsl($hue-primary 85% 50%)
--button-outline-text --color-primary hsl($hue-primary 85% 50%)
--button-outline-text-hover --color-text-inverse $color-neutral-50
--button-outline-border 1px solid currentColor 1px solid currentColor
ghost
VariableDefaultValue
--button-ghost-bg transparent transparent
--button-ghost-bg-hover --color-bg-subtle $color-neutral-100
--button-ghost-text --color-primary hsl($hue-primary 85% 50%)
danger
VariableDefaultValue
--button-danger-bg --color-danger hsl($hue-danger 70% 50%)
--button-danger-bg-hover --color-danger-dark hsl($hue-danger 70% 40%)
link
VariableDefaultValue
--button-link-bg transparent transparent
--button-link-text --color-primary hsl($hue-primary 85% 50%)
--button-link-text-hover --color-primary-dark hsl($hue-primary 85% 40%)

States

<button class="ui-button">Normal</button>
<button class="ui-button" disabled>Disabled</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--loading">Loading</button>

Full Width

<button class="ui-button ui-button--block">Full Width</button>

Icon Button

Square icon-only buttons. Use with SVG icons from Lucide or similar sets.

<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--sm">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- x icon --></svg>
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- plus icon --></svg>
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--lg">
  <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- search icon --></svg>
</button>

Icon Button Variants

<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon">...</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--secondary">...</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--outline">...</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--ghost">...</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--icon ui-button--danger">...</button>

With Icon

Buttons with icon and text. Use ui-button__icon element with --start or --end modifier.

<button class="ui-button">
  <svg class="ui-icon ui-button__icon ui-button__icon--start"><!-- plus --></svg>
  Add Item
</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--secondary">
  Next
  <svg class="ui-icon ui-button__icon ui-button__icon--end"><!-- chevron-right --></svg>
</button>

Radius

<button class="ui-button ui-button--radius-none">None</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--radius-sm">Small</button>
<button class="ui-button">Default</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--radius-lg">Large</button>
<button class="ui-button ui-button--radius-full">Pill</button>

</label>

Code

Inline code and code blocks with monospace font.

Inline code

Use the --space-2 token for padding.

<p>Use the <code class="ui-code">--space-2</code> token for padding.</p>
VariableDefaultValue
--code-font-size --size-sm 0.875rem
--code-bg --color-bg-muted $color-neutral-200
--code-padding-x --space-1 $unit
--code-padding-y --space-0 $unit * 0.5
--code-radius --radius-sm $unit * 0.5
--code-font-size-block --size-sm 0.875rem
--code-bg-block --color-bg-muted $color-neutral-200
--code-padding-block --space-3 $unit * 3
--code-radius-block --radius-md $unit
--code-border-color-block --color-border $color-neutral-200
--button-height 
<code class="ui-code ui-code--sm">--button-height</code>

Code block

.button {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
}
<pre class="ui-code-block"><code>.button {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
}</code></pre>

Field

Form field wrapper that combines label, control, helper text, and error message.

Default

<div class="ui-field">
  <label class="ui-label" for="email">Email</label>
  <div class="ui-field__control">
    <input type="email" id="email" class="ui-input">
  </div>
</div>

With Helper Text

Must be at least 8 characters
<div class="ui-field">
  <label class="ui-label" for="password">Password</label>
  <div class="ui-field__control">
    <input type="password" id="password" class="ui-input">
    <span class="ui-form-helper">Must be at least 8 characters</span>
  </div>
</div>

With Error

Username must be at least 3 characters
<div class="ui-field">
  <label class="ui-label" for="username">Username</label>
  <div class="ui-field__control">
    <input type="text" id="username" class="ui-input ui-input--error">
    <span class="ui-form-error">Username must be at least 3 characters</span>
  </div>
</div>

Horizontal Layout

Label beside control for wider forms

As it appears on your ID
<div class="ui-field ui-field--horizontal">
  <label class="ui-label ui-field__label" for="name">Full Name</label>
  <div class="ui-field__control">
    <input type="text" id="name" class="ui-input">
    <span class="ui-form-helper">As it appears on your ID</span>
  </div>
</div>

Required Field

<div class="ui-field">
  <label class="ui-label ui-label--required" for="req">Required Field</label>
  <div class="ui-field__control">
    <input type="text" id="req" class="ui-input" required>
  </div>
</div>

</span>

Form Helper

Helper text for form fields. Provides additional context or instructions.

Heading

Semantic headings with visual size control. Use semantic level (h1-h6) for structure, size modifier for visual styling.

Sizes

Heading 3xl

Heading 2xl

Heading xl

Heading lg

Heading md
Heading sm
<h1 class="ui-heading ui-heading--3xl">3xl</h1>
<h2 class="ui-heading ui-heading--2xl">2xl</h2>
<h3 class="ui-heading ui-heading--xl">xl</h3>
<h4 class="ui-heading ui-heading--lg">lg</h4>
<h5 class="ui-heading ui-heading--md">md</h5>
<h6 class="ui-heading ui-heading--sm">sm</h6>

Decoupled Sizing

Use any size with any semantic level

h2 styled as 3xl

h1 styled as lg

<h2 class="ui-heading ui-heading--3xl">h2 styled as 3xl</h2>
<h1 class="ui-heading ui-heading--lg">h1 styled as lg</h1>

Muted

Muted heading

<h2 class="ui-heading ui-heading--muted">Muted</h2>

Icon

CSS classes for sizing and styling SVG icons. Works with any stroke-based icon set like Lucide, Heroicons, or Feather.

Basic Usage

Add the `ui-icon` class to any SVG. Icons inherit color from their parent via `currentColor`.

<svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M12 5v14M5 12h14"/></svg>

With Lucide Icons

Recommended icon set. Copy SVG from lucide.dev and add the ui-icon class.

<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--gap-2"><svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="m3 9 9-7 9 7v11a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H5a2 2 0 0 1-2-2z"/><polyline points="9 22 9 12 15 12 15 22"/></svg><svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"/><path d="m21 21-4.3-4.3"/></svg><svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M6 8a6 6 0 0 1 12 0c0 7 3 9 3 9H3s3-2 3-9"/><path d="M10.3 21a1.94 1.94 0 0 0 3.4 0"/></svg><svg class="ui-icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H9a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2"/><circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4"/></svg></div>

Sizes

{% for s in sizes %}

{% endfor %}

Stroke Width

Adjust stroke thickness for visual weight.

<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg ui-icon--stroke-thin" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></svg>
<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></svg>
<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg ui-icon--stroke-thick" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></svg>

Filled Icons

For solid icons, use the `--filled` modifier.

<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></svg>
<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg ui-icon--filled" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"></svg>

Spin Animation

Use `--spin` for loading indicators.

<svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg ui-icon--spin" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M21 12a9 9 0 1 1-6.219-8.56"/></svg>

Color Inheritance

Icons inherit color from parent text color.

<div class="ui-cluster ui-cluster--gap-2"><span style="color: var(--ui-color-primary)"><svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"/><path d="m21 21-4.3-4.3"/></svg></span><span style="color: var(--ui-color-success)"><svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"/><path d="m21 21-4.3-4.3"/></svg></span><span style="color: var(--ui-color-danger)"><svg class="ui-icon ui-icon--lg" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8"/><path d="m21 21-4.3-4.3"/></svg></span></div>

Input

Text input field for user data entry. Heights align to grid rows.

Default

<input class="ui-input" type="text" placeholder="Enter text...">

Sizes

<input class="ui-input ui-input--sm" placeholder="Small">
<input class="ui-input" placeholder="Default">
<input class="ui-input ui-input--lg" placeholder="Large">

Variants

<input class="ui-input" placeholder="Outline">
<input class="ui-input ui-input--filled" placeholder="Filled">
<input class="ui-input ui-input--ghost" placeholder="Ghost">

States

<input class="ui-input" placeholder="Default">
<input class="ui-input ui-input--error" value="Invalid">
<input class="ui-input ui-input--success" value="Valid">
<input class="ui-input" disabled placeholder="Disabled">
<input class="ui-input" readonly value="Read only">

Full Width

<input class="ui-input ui-input--block" type="text" placeholder="Full width input">

With Prefix Icon

<div class="ui-input-group ui-input-group--has-prefix">
  <span class="ui-input-group__addon ui-input-group__addon--start">
    <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- search icon --></svg>
  </span>
  <input class="ui-input ui-input--block" type="search" placeholder="Search...">
</div>

With Suffix Icon

<div class="ui-input-group ui-input-group--has-suffix">
  <input class="ui-input ui-input--block" type="email" placeholder="Email">
  <span class="ui-input-group__addon ui-input-group__addon--end">
    <svg class="ui-icon"><!-- mail icon --></svg>
  </span>
</div>

With Both Addons

<div class="ui-input-group ui-input-group--has-prefix ui-input-group--has-suffix">
  <span class="ui-input-group__addon ui-input-group__addon--start">...</span>
  <input class="ui-input ui-input--block" placeholder="Username">
  <span class="ui-input-group__addon ui-input-group__addon--end ui-input-group__addon--interactive">...</span>
</div>

Label

Form control labels. Associates text with inputs via htmlFor or wrapping.

Default

<label class="ui-label" for="input">Email address</label>

Required

<label class="ui-label" for="input">
  Email address
  <span class="ui-label__required">*</span>
</label>

Optional

<label class="ui-label" for="input">
  Phone number
  <span class="ui-label__optional">(optional)</span>
</label>

Sizes

<label class="ui-label">Default</label>
<label class="ui-label ui-label--lg">Large</label>

Disabled

<label class="ui-label" aria-disabled="true">Disabled</label>

Link

Styled anchor element for text links with consistent hover and focus states.

Default

Default link 
<a href="#" class="ui-link">Default link</a>

Muted Variant

For secondary or less prominent links

Muted link 
<a href="#" class="ui-link ui-link--muted">Muted link</a>

Subtle Variant

No underline by default, shows on hover

Subtle link 
<a href="#" class="ui-link ui-link--subtle">Subtle link</a>

External Link

Adds arrow indicator for external links

External link 
<a href="#" class="ui-link ui-link--external">External link</a>

Disabled

Disabled link 
<a href="#" class="ui-link ui-link--disabled" aria-disabled="true">
  Disabled link
</a>

In Context

Links inherit text size from context

Read our privacy policy for more information.

<p>
  Read our <a href="#" class="ui-link">privacy policy</a>
  for more information.
</p>

Overlay

Full viewport backdrop for modals, dialogs, and drawers. Controls visibility via state modifiers.

Default

Content behind overlay

<div class="ui-overlay"></div>

Light Variant

Dark content behind light overlay

<div class="ui-overlay ui-overlay--light"></div>

Blur Variant

Blurred backdrop

<div class="ui-overlay ui-overlay--blur"></div>

With Animation

<div class="ui-overlay ui-overlay--animate ui-overlay--visible"></div>
<!-- JS toggles between --visible and --hidden -->

Radio

Native radio button with custom styling. Use for mutually exclusive options within a group.

Default

<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" name="group1">
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" name="group1" checked>

Sizes

<input type="radio" class="ui-radio ui-radio--sm" checked>
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" checked>
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio ui-radio--lg" checked>

States

<input type="radio" class="ui-radio">
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" checked>
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" disabled>
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio" checked disabled>

Error State

<input type="radio" class="ui-radio ui-radio--error">
<input type="radio" class="ui-radio ui-radio--error" checked>

With Label

<label class="ui-cluster">
  <input type="radio" class="ui-radio" name="group">
  <span>Option one</span>
</label>

Radio Group

Choose an option
<fieldset>
  <legend>Choose an option</legend>
  <div class="ui-stack">
    <label class="ui-cluster">
      <input type="radio" class="ui-radio" name="group" checked>
      <span>Option A</span>
    </label>
    <label class="ui-cluster">
      <input type="radio" class="ui-radio" name="group">
      <span>Option B</span>
    </label>
  </div>
</fieldset>

    <option>Lemon</option>

</div>

</button>

Tabs

Tabbed interface with tab list and panels. Requires JS for interaction.

Default

Panel 1 content
Panel 2 content
Panel 3 content
<div class="ui-tabs">
  <div class="ui-tabs__list">
    <button class="ui-tabs__tab ui-tabs__tab--active">Tab 1</button>
    <button class="ui-tabs__tab">Tab 2</button>
    <button class="ui-tabs__tab">Tab 3</button>
  </div>
  <div class="ui-tabs__panel ui-tabs__panel--active">Panel 1 content</div>
  <div class="ui-tabs__panel">Panel 2 content</div>
  <div class="ui-tabs__panel">Panel 3 content</div>
</div>
VariableDefaultValue
--tabs-border-color --color-border $color-neutral-200
--tabs-tab-padding-x --space-2 $unit * 2
--tabs-tab-padding-y --space-1 $unit
--tabs-tab-bg transparent transparent
--tabs-tab-bg-active --color-bg $color-neutral-50
--tabs-panel-padding --space-3 $unit * 3

Two Tabs

Preview content goes here
<div>Code snippet</div>
<div class="ui-tabs">
  <div class="ui-tabs__list">
    <button class="ui-tabs__tab ui-tabs__tab--active">Preview</button>
    <button class="ui-tabs__tab">Code</button>
  </div>
  <div class="ui-tabs__panel ui-tabs__panel--active">...</div>
  <div class="ui-tabs__panel">...</div>
</div>

Visually Hidden

Hides content visually while keeping it accessible to screen readers. Use for skip links and accessible labels.

Default

Content is hidden visually but announced by screen readers

<button>
  Submit
  <span class="ui-visually-hidden"> form to contact support</span>
</button>

Focusable (Skip Link)

Becomes visible when focused - useful for skip links

Skip to main content 
<a href="#main" class="ui-visually-hidden ui-visually-hidden--focusable">
  Skip to main content
</a>
